channel.title: Radiationscape 24/7 redesigned!
channel.description:
Hey guys, i just would like to show you my redesigned RadiationScape:
Home area:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/homearea-1.gif[/img]
shops at home area:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/lotsofshops.gif[/img]
cool items:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/newitems.gif[/img]
Runescape-like graphics:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/bluephattake.gif[/img]
all spell books (working):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/magic1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/magic2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/magic3.gif[/img]
Easy to switch magics:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/switchmagicsarea.gif[/img]
Working friends list (none of my friends happened to be on at the time):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/workingfriendslist.gif[/img]
working prayer: [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/workingprayer1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/workingprayer2.gif[/img]
Unlimited bank space:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/unlimitedbankspace.gif[/img]
Training areas & Easy to find monsters:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/trainarea.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/protrainarea.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/epictrainarea.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/monsterfights.gif[/img]
Pking areas:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/pk1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/pk2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/pk3.gif[/img]
You can do ::watchfight to watch fights in progress:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/watchingarea.gif[/img]
Skillcapes:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/skillcapesshop.gif[/img]
Skiller area & where to make money:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/skillerarea.gif[/img]
for pix-elated nature lovers:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/escapearea.gif[/img]
[size=12pt]Tell me what you think below![/size]

item.title: Radiationscape 24/7 redesigned!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Just for a heads up there isnt a way to create an “unlimited bank” after 500ish items are added the scrollbar wont go any lower.

Read full topic

item.title: Radiationscape 24/7 redesigned!
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

never really liked that teleport interface cant really tell if this is a advert or not if it isn’t add more information i.e goals recent achievements what your looking for also i recommended prnt scrn + tinypic or photobucket and dont save it as a gif cause your photos look like crap

if it is a advertisment post http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php here

Read full topic
